tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (DT This)) (VP (MD should) (VP (VP (VB be) (NP (DT a) (NN task))) (: ...) (VP (VB walk) (PRT (RP down)) (NP (PRP$ my) (JJ frozen) (JJ solid) (NN ice) (NNS stairs)) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB get) (PP (TO to) (NP (PRP$ my) (NN car))))))))) (. !)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [task/NN nsubj>This/DT aux>should/MD cop>be/VB det>a/DT punct>.../: dep>[walk/VB compound:prt>down/RP dobj>[stairs/NNS nmod:poss>my/PRP$ amod>frozen/JJ amod>solid/JJ compound>ice/NN] advcl>[get/VB mark>to/TO nmod:to>[car/NN case>to/TO nmod:poss>my/PRP$]]] punct>!/.]
